attributes.action: end the dumping of our Forces  wounded on nhs wards and provide our forces with all necessary  medical assistance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is the nations duty to provide the very best of  care and assistance both in the field and at home .having to rely on the nhs for treatment is an absolute disgrace where are our once excelent forces hospital facilities. you sent them now you help them recover with some dignity now is the time to show this nation cares do something  Mr. prime minister NOW PLEASE !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
